patthana24.21:1.1: Nasaraṇaṁ nasārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana24.21:2.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ naanārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.21:2.1_1: Naaraṇaṁ naanārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.21:2.1_2: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve, adhipatiyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
patthana24.21:3.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ nacittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo citto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṁ
patthana24.21:3.1_1: nacittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo citto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana24.21:3.1_2: Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
patthana24.21:4.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ nacetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.21:4.1_1: Naaraṇaṁ nacetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.21:4.1_2: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
patthana24.21:5.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ nacittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati
patthana24.21:5.1_1: hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṁ nacittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo cittasampayutto dhammo
patthana24.21:5.1_2: uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana24.21:6.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ nacittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo cittasaṁsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati
patthana24.21:6.1_1: hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṁ nacittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo cittasaṁsaṭṭho dhammo
patthana24.21:6.1_2: uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
